list_definition.definition: (also spittleˈspitl) the liquid that forms in the mouth.
to throw out (spit) from the mouth

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He spat in the gutter as an indication of contempt.

list_definition.definition: a type of sharp-pointed metal bar on which meat is roasted

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They’re roasting a lamb on a spit.
